QuestData.Title: Release the Hounds
QuestData.Description:
I have heard the familiar howls and barks of bakar that are missing from camp.
Our beloved dogs are trapped in cages, waiting to be ripped apart by those... those things.
We have a duty to our companions. Free them and witness the true might of a Shikaar bakar!
QuestData.RewardText:
Magnificent beasts, aren't they?
Every bakar holds a special place in Clan Shikaar. They are our fellow hunters, guards, and our most cherished friends.
